raw_body: UDUWAWALA – PADMINI – Beloved wife of the late Edmund Uduwawala,​ loving mother of Nalin (UK),​ Nirmala and Senaka,​ mother-in-law of Chrishanthi and Nilakshi,​ grandmother of Shamendra and Rosy,​ Chandi and Jessica Sewwandhi and Nipuna,​ Nelum and Heshan,​ great grandmother of Thilini and Eshin,​ expired. Cremation on Saturday,​ 14th October at Mahaiyawa Cemetery,​ Kandy at 1.00 p.m. Cortege leaves residence : 52,​ Bahirawakanda Path,​ Kandy at 12 p.m.065793
